text:
Bonifácio José Tamm de Andrada (14 May 1930 – 5 January 2021) was a Brazilian politician, law academic and journalist. He was born in Barbacena, Minas Gerais. He was a member of the Brazilian Social Democracy Party. From 1979 to 2019, he was a member of the Chamber of Deputies.
Andrada died on 5 January 2021 in Barbacena from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 90.
